          Contains the selected directory as a text field or any user input.

          The UI's button to start directory selection.

        • imageIcon

          An image icon that is displayed as part of the button.

        • directoryOnly

          Should this component be used to select directories only, default value is false.

    • Class de.aikiit.bildbearbeiter.gui.ProgressBar extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textInfo

          JLabel textInfo
          Text field to show current file or other information during run.

        • progressBar

          JProgressBar progressBar
          The visual progress bar.

        • delayInUI

          int delayInUI
          Amount of seconds the UI sleeps in order to give a user a chance to read the screen, this value is calculated dynamically depending on the amount of pictures to be processed.
